---
title: "Create tidy_tuesday notebook"
output: rmarkdown::github_document
---

```{r}
# load package
library(tidytuesdayR) # install.packages("tidytuesdayR")

# create template
tidytuesdayR::use_tidytemplate(
  name = 
    paste0(
      "02_code/tidy_tuesdays/", 
      gsub("-", "", Sys.Date()),
      "_",
      "euro_energy", # name of file
      ".Rmd"
    ),
  refdate = "2020-08-04" # date of file
)
```
